body:
@SsnL I noticed that you have a _backend attribute that returns the backend type of the default process group.  Does this mean that Apex's current syntax, e.g.
```
import torch.distributed as dist 
...
 if dist._backend == dist.dist_backend.NCCL:
```
will work again out of the box?  I will test and see if it does, but I'd like to know if that is your expectation.

Edit:  Nvm, it appears based on this https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/540ef9b1fc5506369a48491af8a285a686689b36#diff-e7ca72f3cddd87e649106f6022a32116R58 and previous conversation that you are hoping I will change things to use `get_backend` in order to be future-proof.  I will do so.  Building latest master now.
